Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
The SQL queries responsible for obtaining the information from the database.

    • getAppointmentList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentList()
      Retrieves an observable list of all appointments from the database.
      Returns:
      appointmentList The list of appointments.

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(int appointmentId, String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, LocalDateTime appointmentStart, LocalDateTime appointmentEnd, int appointmentCustomerId, int appointmentUserId, int appointmentContact)
      Updates an appointment in the database with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to update.
      appointmentTitle - The new title of the appointment.
      appointmentDescription - The new description of the appointment.
      appointmentContact - The new associated contact ID of the appointment.
      appointmentType - The new type of the appointment.
      appointmentStart - The new start date/time of the appointment.
      appointmentEnd - The new end date/time of the appointment.
      appointmentCustomerId - The new associated customer ID of the appointment.
      appointmentUserId - The new associated user ID of the appointment.
      appointmentLocation - The new location of the appointment.

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, LocalDateTime appointmentStart, LocalDateTime appointmentEnd, int appointmentCustomerId, int appointmentUserId, int appointmentContact) throws SQLException
      Adds a new appointment to the database. The appointment ID is auto-incremented by the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentTitle - The title of the appointment.
      appointmentDescription - The description of the appointment.
      appointmentLocation - The location of the appointment.
      appointmentType - The type of the appointment.
      appointmentStart - The start date/time of the appointment.
      appointmentEnd - The end date/time of the appointment.
      appointmentCustomerId - The associated customer ID of the appointment.
      appointmentUserId - The associated user ID of the appointment.
      appointmentContact - The associated contact ID of the appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException - aif there is an error executing the SQL statement.

    • getWeeklyAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getWeeklyAppointments()
      Retrieves a list of weekly appointments for the next 7 days from the database.
      Returns:
      observsableList of Appointment objects representing the weekly appointments.

      Returns:

    • appointmentType

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointmentType()

      Returns:
